title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.4 - Fire and safety inspections
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.4 - Fire and safety inspections

State Regulations

The chief administrative officer of each facility shall
request the appropriate authority having code enforcement jurisdiction to
conduct an annual fire and safety inspection. A copy of the report based on
such inspection together with a detailed statement of steps taken or to be
taken to correct any deficiencies set forth in such report shall be maintained
on file. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7039.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
